name: ProcessRequest

methods.name: getComments
methods.description: Returns the comments that have been added previously to the approval request.

methods.name: getNextApproverIds
methods.description: Returns the list of user IDs of user specified as approvers.

methods.name: setComments
methods.description: Sets the comments to be added to the approval request.

methods.name: setNextApproverIds
methods.description: If the next step in your approval process is another Apex approval process, you specify exactly one user ID as the next approver. If not, you cannot specify a user ID and this method must be null.

description: The ProcessRequest class is the parent class for the ProcessSubmitRequest and ProcessWorkitemRequest classes. Use the ProcessRequest class to write generic Apex that can process objects from either class.
